title: The.Games.Season.1.DVDRip.XviD-TAR
description:
Summary:

This mischievious Australian mockumentary comedy takes a satirical look at the bureaucrats as they orchestrate the extravaganza that will be the Sydney 2000 Olympic Games.

Fans of Yes Minister will appreciate the dry humour and witty semantics as the three bungling committee members John, Brian and Gina deal with issues such as a 100 metres running track that is several metres short of the mark, over zealous sponsorship opportunities from tobacco companies and sex-change athletes - do they run in the men&#039;s or women&#039;s events?

Cast:

John Clarke ... John
Bryan Dawe ... Bryan
Gina Riley ... Gina
Nicholas Bell ... Nicholas
Tim Schwerdt ... Tim
